name: Feed Usagi For Sailor Moon
summary:
Unofficial catching game for Sailor Moon.

Everyone knows the girl named Bunny who every day protects the Earth and the moon from invaders from other planets and after a battle loves a hearty meal to restore her strength.

Help the "Usagi" to eat, collecting edible items! And always be alert, evil forces will try in every way to prevent you feed the sweet warrior, unpleasant surprises.
